name: Escape from Perlsea Keep
description:
You have been imprisoned inside Perlsea Keep, you must make your escape!

Made in 72 hours for 72 Pin Connector Retro Jam!

Escape from Perlsea Keep is an early 90s styled FPS, similar to Wolfenstein 3D with a labyrinth like layout with many a breakable wall for quick navigation and replay opportunities. 

--==Controls==--

Up/Down Arrow = Forward/Backward
Left/Right Arrow = LookLeft/LookRight
Z/X = Strafe
L Ctrl = Shoot
Space = Open Door
1/2/3 = Weapon Select

(Controls pulled straight from the 90s B)
